activities: Stream Global Services and its subsidiaries may receive the followings types of personal data from the EU: (a) data concerning employees, contractors, consultants and their family members and beneficiaries, (b) data concerning potential employees, contractors and consultants and their family members and beneficiaries; (c) data concerning Stream’s clients and their customers, (d) data regarding Stream’s vendors and suppliers and (e) data regarding Stream’s shareholders.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: off-line, on-line, manually processed data, human resources data
recoursemech: For human resources data: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC); For all other types of data: BBB EU Safe Harbor
